text.autoconfig.inventory_tabs.title: Inventory Tabs Config
text.autoconfig.inventory_tabs.option.do: Check if block is in line of sight
If §cNo§r, you are able to click on inventories through walls
text.autoconfig.inventory_tabs.option.ro: Rotate the player to face the tab's block
If §aYes§r, the player will snap to position
text.autoconfig.inventory_tabs.option.ex: §nDo not show§r tabs for these blocks:
text.autoconfig.inventory_tabs.option.de: Print debugging information (tab IDs added/removed) in the log
